dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2935 IH: Disabled Veterans Red Tape Reduction Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To provide for a five-year extension of the authority of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide for the conduct of medical disability examinations by contract physicians.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Disabled Veterans Red Tape Reduction Act.

section.header: Five-year extension of authority of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide for the conduct of medical disability examinations by contract physicians
section.text: Section 704(c) of the Veterans Benefits Act of 2003 (Public Law 108–183; 38 U.S.C. 5101 note) is amended by striking December 31, 2015 and inserting December 31, 2018.
